p: The data collection was conducted by a commercial research company (Norstat). Participants were recruited from their online panel of adult (18 years and older) Norwegian citizens. The final sample consists of 266 participants that had completed all three stages of the study (presentation of the story and retelling at two points in time). Their age ranged from 18 to 82 years ( M = 44.5, SD = 15.8); 121 were female and 145 male; 176 held a Bachelor or higher university degree.
